name: Mexican Chicken and Rice Soup (Sopa de Pollo y Arroz)
author: Josefina Mijares
summary: Homemade chicken consomme with vegetables, fresh herbs, and rice, served with serrano chile, avocado, and a touch of lime juice.
ingredients: 2 pounds skin-on, bone-in whole chicken legs (drumsticks and thighs)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring stock to a boil in a large pot over high heat
Add chicken legs; return to a boil
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, skimming away foam that forms on the surface
Add carrots, onion, celery, cilantro, garlic, and mint
Cover pot and cook until chicken is no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 30 minutes more
Remove chicken from the pot; discard skin and bones
Return chicken meat to the pot and season with salt and pepper
Remove from heat and pour soup into serving bowls
Top with avocado and serrano peppers and squeeze in lime juice
